indexPage.info-section-title: The easiest way to stake Solana

info-section-step-items.title: Stake SOL
info-section-step-items.subtitle: Select amount of SOL to stake using Marinade liquid staking protocol.

info-section-step-items.title: Receive mSol
info-section-step-items.subtitle: In return, you receive liquid SOL (mSol) increasing value with staking rewards.

info-section-step-items.title: Participate in DeFi
info-section-step-items.subtitle: Now you're free to use your liquid mSol in DeFi or swap back to SOL any time you like.

info-section-items.heading: without locking your funds in
info-section-items.desc: By going with Marinade you avoid the unstaking period so you're free to use your assets at any time you like.
info-section-items.quote: Staking on Marinade is the easiest way to earn yields on your SOL and help decentralize the chain.
info-section-items.name: AlphaRay

info-section-items.heading: to 300+ top-performing validators
info-section-items.desc: Algorithmic strategy delegates to hundreds of validators to make the system more robust, secure and decentralised.
info-section-items.quote: Marinade's staking strategy makes it easy for users to help make Solana ever more decentralized and censorship resistant.
info-section-items.name: Dan Albert

info-section-items.heading: in the DeFi ecosystem
info-section-items.desc: By going with Marinade you avoid the unstaking period so you're free to use your assets at any time you like.
info-section-items.quote: Marinade allows our users to strengthen the security of the Solana network while continuing to interact with other apps on Solana via our LP tokens.
info-section-items.name: Ian Macalinao

why-section-items.title: Liquid unstake
why-section-items.subtitle: Avoid the unstake period and get your SOL back any time you want.

why-section-items.title: Decentralization
why-section-items.subtitle: Improve the network security by staking to +400 validators.

why-section-items.title: Unlocked liquidity
why-section-items.subtitle: Put your staked SOL to work in DeFi and gain an additional yield.

indexPage.contributor-section-subtitle: Marinade is a community-driven project built without any VC money or token sales. Join the Marinade DAO and come build together with us.
